page.title: 12Schools _ Leeswood area
page.content: In the Leeswood area there are three primary schools which are Coed Talon, Ysgol Terrig ,Treuddyn & Leeswood C.P. Coed Talon county primary school is 100 years old and it has about 110 pupils;its catchment area is Treuddyn, Coed Talon and Pontybodkin. Treuddyn school is a Welsh-medium primary school,enabling pupils from the surrounding villages to receive their education in Welsh. Leeswood County primary is 6 years old and it has 180 pupils.There were two schools before the new school opened.The two old schools were called the V.P. & C.P. The catchment area is Leeswood & Pontybodkin. Pupils from these schools leave to High Schools in Hope,Flint or Mold.
